text: The Universal Basketball Association (UBA) is a semi-professional men's basketball minor league in the United States that began play in 2009. The league typically play a Spring season schedule. Teams are split into geographical divisions, from Georgia, Indiana, Kentucky, North Carolina, Ohio and Texas. == History == UBA announced the addition of an Eastern division scheduled to begin in 2015.
